info.name: Pet Dog Registration API
info.description: Complete Postman collection for Pet Dog Registration using Dynamic Form approach

body.raw:
{
    "form_id": 12,
    "owner_name": "John Doe",
    "owner_phone": "9876543210",
    "owner_email": "john.doe@example.com",
    "owner_address": "123 Main Street, Tura, West Garo Hills, Meghalaya - 794001",
    "owner_aadhar_number": "123456789012",
    "dog_name": "Buddy",
    "dog_breed": "Golden Retriever",
    "dog_age": 3,
    "dog_color": "Golden",
    "dog_gender": "male",
    "dog_weight": 30.5,
    "vaccination_status": "completed",
    "vaccination_date": "2024-11-15",
    "veterinarian_name": "Dr. Smith Johnson",
    "veterinarian_license": "VET12345",
    "upload_files": [],
    "document_list": [
        {
            "name": "vaccination_certificate.pdf",
            "data": "data:application/pdf;base64,"
        },
        {
            "name": "dog_photo.jpg",
            "data": "data:image/jpeg;base64,"
        }
    ],
    "declaration": "I hereby declare that all the information provided above is true and accurate to the best of my knowledge. I understand that providing false information may result in the rejection of this application."
}

request.description: Submit Pet Dog Registration with all required fields

item.name: Submit Pet Dog Registration - Optional Fields

body.raw:
{
    "form_id": 12,
    "owner_name": "Sarah Wilson",
    "owner_phone": "8765432109",
    "owner_email": "sarah.wilson@example.com",
    "owner_address": "456 Oak Avenue, Tura Municipal Area, Meghalaya - 794002",
    "owner_aadhar_number": "987654321098",
    "dog_age": 2,
    "dog_color": "Brown and White",
    "dog_gender": "female",
    "dog_weight": 15.8,
    "vaccination_status": "pending",
    "vaccination_date": "2024-12-20",

    "veterinarian_license": "VET67890",
    "upload_files": [],
    "document_list": [
        {
            "name": "owner_id_proof.jpg",
            "data": "data:image/jpeg;base64,"
        }
    ],
    "declaration": "I confirm that the information provided is accurate and I agree to comply with all municipal regulations regarding pet registration."
}

request.description: Submit Pet Dog Registration with dog_name and dog_breed as optional (null/empty)
